We have already delivered more than 60,000 Prius vehicles globally. Although this number is small compared to Camry, it exceeds the total sales of all other "eco" vehicles.

Automobile manufacturers alone will not decide which technologies eventually win out toward the ultimate eco-car in the marketplace. That decision will be made by society. We believe that hybrid vehicles represent a practical way of lowering the environmental impact of the automobile while still offering the customer the attributes he or she has come to expect. We believe they are the logical transition to the future. I’d be glad to answer your questions at this time.
